title: Fardaws Aimaq signs with Red Raiders - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Fardaws Aimaq signs with Red Raiders - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Texas Tech head coach Mark Adams has officially announced the signing of Fardaws Aimaq to a financial aid agreement. Aimaq earned 2022 and 2021 Western Athletic Conference Defensive Player of the Year, 2021 WAC Player of the Year and was a two-time All-WAC First Team selection the past two seasons at Utah Valley State University after beginning his career with one year at Mercer.
